title: I LOVE LISTS
description: I LOVE LISTS Have you experienced one of these soda machines? Theyre wild. What a photographer sees vs. shoots. Time travel: Club 57 in the 1980s. I’ve been doing this foil hack for grilling for years! Let’s look at things under a microscope. If you need help learning how to cook a steak. How to pick out a pineapple. Hello, dream home in Sonoma. A list of the world’s best restaurants. Why following our fixations makes our creative work better. Size comparison photos! Teaching dogs to communicate with button boards. Do you kill the spiders in your house? I bet this lit-up checklist would be very motivating. Landscaping decisions that affect a home’s value. Let’s see how we can make dates taste like Snickers. Movies to watch before your next road trip! I wish they had elastic shoelaces when I was a kid. They’re amazing. Picnic Food Ideas and Picnic Packing Essentials Weekend treat: Cherry Pie Crumble Bars I’m hosting a Half-Year Reset Workshop on Saturday, June 28th on Zoom! Together, we’ll: Reflect on what’s been working (and what hasn’t) Reset your goals and intentions for the rest of the year Refresh your systems for organizing time + meal planning Go over my Sunday rituals that help me stay grounded Make planning feel fun (not like another chore!) This is your moment to reconnect with yourself with grace and structure. Check out my summer bucket list on Substack- Summer Bucket List 2025! The post I LOVE LISTS appeared first on Shutterbean.
excerpt: I Love Lists is a weekly roundup of the best links from around the internet, curated by Tracy Benjamin of Shutterbean. Discover inspiring reads, creative ideas, delicious recipes, and fun finds every week!
text: SEARCH THE ARCHIVES SEARCH THE ARCHIVES
